title: Be Grateful Little Bear
description: Be Grateful Little Bear is a great addition to any read-aloud collection with its lively illustrations and understated moral lesson. Written in pleasing rhyming couplets, it tells the story of a little bear who thinks the grass must be greener from a bird's eye view, but in the end discovers just how much a little bear has to be grateful for. Be Grateful Little Bear is the first of a series of books meant for tots and tykes ages one to five years old. Parents who recognize the importance of children growing up with a healthy sense of gratitude will love this book! Written by Kara Evelyn-McNeil in collaboration with U.K. illustrator, Max Scratchmann, this dynamite team is offering parents a tool for starting this important conversation about not taking anything for granted.
author: Kara Evelyn-McNeil
